name: Finland
description: Finland is known for its beautiful lakes and stunning natural landscapes.
gastronomy: Finnish cuisine includes dishes like Karelian pasty, reindeer stew, and salmon soup.

name: Sweden
description: Sweden offers a mix of picturesque cities, historic sites, and breathtaking archipelagos.
gastronomy: Swedish cuisine features dishes like meatballs, herring, and cinnamon buns.
political_system: Constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary democracy

name: Norway
description: Norway boasts dramatic fjords, northern lights, and a rich Viking history.
gastronomy: Norwegian cuisine includes dishes like salmon, rakfisk, and brunost.
political_system: Constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary democracy

name: Germany
description: Germany is famous for its cultural heritage, diverse cities, and delicious cuisine.
gastronomy: German cuisine includes dishes like bratwurst, sauerkraut, and pretzels.

name: Greece
description: Greece is the birthplace of Western civilization, known for its ancient ruins and stunning islands.
gastronomy: Greek cuisine includes dishes like moussaka, souvlaki, and tzatziki.

name: Italy
description: Italy offers iconic landmarks, historic art, and a rich history of Renaissance and Roman culture.
gastronomy: Italian cuisine includes dishes like pasta, pizza, and gelato.

name: Japan
description: Japan seamlessly combines modern technology with traditional culture, offering futuristic cities and serene temples.
gastronomy: Japanese cuisine includes dishes like sushi, ramen, and tempura.
political_system: Constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary government

name: United Kingdom
description: The UK is a blend of historic castles, vibrant cities, and diverse cultural influences.
gastronomy: British cuisine includes dishes like fish and chips, roast beef, and afternoon tea.
political_system: Constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary democracy

name: United States
description: The US features a wide range of landscapes, iconic cities, and cultural diversity.
gastronomy: American cuisine is diverse, with dishes like hamburgers, hot dogs, and apple pie.
religion: Religious diversity, including Christianity, Islam, Judaism, and others

name: Ecuador
description: Ecuador offers diverse ecosystems, including the Amazon rainforest and the Galápagos Islands.
gastronomy: Ecuadorian cuisine includes dishes like ceviche, empanadas, and llapingachos.

name: Colombia
description: Colombia is known for its lush landscapes, coffee plantations, and vibrant culture.
gastronomy: Colombian cuisine includes dishes like arepas, bandeja paisa, and sancocho.

name: Argentina
description: Argentina boasts tango music, stunning natural wonders like Iguazu Falls, and a rich history.
gastronomy: Argentinian cuisine includes dishes like asado, empanadas, and mate.

name: Spain
description: Spain offers diverse regions, historic architecture, and a lively Mediterranean lifestyle.
gastronomy: Spanish cuisine includes dishes like paella, tapas, and churros.

name: Canada
description: Canada is known for its vast wilderness, friendly cities, and stunning national parks.
gastronomy: Canadian cuisine includes dishes like poutine, maple syrup, and butter tarts.
political_system: Federal parliamentary democracy and constitutional monarchy
religion: Religious diversity, including Christianity, Islam, and others

name: Australia
description: Australia features iconic landmarks, unique wildlife, and stunning coastal landscapes.
gastronomy: Australian cuisine includes dishes like Vegemite, meat pies, and Tim Tams.
